hymn.title: Within my heart a praise o'erflowing
hymn.category: Assurance and Joy of Salvation—Satisfied with Christ

layout.singingstanza: With -- in my heart a praise o'er -- flow -- ing 'Tis the gra -- cious Lord, my song; There nev -- er was a song so ex -- cel -- lent; Heav -- en's joys to me be -- long. In my heart there springs a mel -- o -- dy, The sweet -- est mel -- o -- dy, a song so heav -- en -- ly, In my heart there springs a mel -- o -- dy, There springs a mel -- o -- dy of love.

lyrics.stanza: In my heart there springs a melody, The sweetest melody, a song so heavenly, In my heart there springs a melody, There springs a melody of love.
O light of life, my Lord now leads me. Step by step this song I raise; O perfect peace, Christ now abides in me, Welling up in psalms of praise.
The Holy City, what a blessing! Living water flowing free, The tree of life with fruits abundant, sweet, Satisfy eternally.
